input_email_body:
Subject: Crash Issue with Integrations

The project management platform has encountered a crash You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. It is suspected that the incompatibility with WeChat and Microsoft Teams could be the reason. Steps taken so far include restarting the server and reviewing Azure logs. My name is Omar Hassan.
